text: You jeopardized a man's life.

You're supposed to be her supervisor.

Why are you speaking this way to my brother?
Because your brother is suing Ripley
and the hospital for malpractice.
I didn't think it would happen so fast.
Alzheimer's is just a very tricky diagnosis.
I'm sorry about this afternoon.
I didn't have the bandwidth for worlds colliding.
Of course not.
It wasn't the time or the place.
- Thank you. - Mm-hmm. You too.
Medium black coffee for me, and I got her today.

Because it's her birthday.
Oh, happy birthday.
Thank you.
I gotta say, I'm so pumped for the big bash tonight.
I mean, pretty cool.
You have the same birthday as your grandbaby?
I mean, come on.

doesn't pass out before cake.
So is tonight really the first night

Well, just two of them.

So how are you feeling?
Introducing the boyfriend to the family.

last night, so... - Oh, come on.
Dennis is gonna charm their socks off.

I got a meeting on the Pawel suit in five.

No worries.
How are things at home?
Honestly, it's a little strained.
Yeah, I can imagine.

You are a good mom.

Do you remember Sean's?
Sean's first serious breakup?

Uh, well, actually, Sean was the one doing

Yeah, that does line up.

It's to settle.

That true?

She's suspended pending an investigation of the incident.
Shayna Ellis, 28-year-old female.
She and a companion were driving a UTV on the freeway

Took a side-by-side on the freeway?
Shocking it didn't end well, right?
She was pretty combative at the scene,
wouldn't let us treat her.
Gave her two of Versed, four of morphine.
She's sedated but rousable.
Shayna, can you hear me? You're at Chicago Med.
We're gonna take good care of you, okay?

The driver was not.
She got ejected from the vehicle.
Yikes.
Clear breath sounds bilaterally.
She's tachycardic.
I'm gonna ultrasound.

No.
Her right kidney look a little abnormal to you?
Yeah, it does.
Nancy, let's get chest and pelvis X-rays,
as well as an abdominal CT.
Yep. On it.
We did everything we could for her at the scene,

There they are! Look!
Back off right now!
They do not consent to treatment!

You good?
Yeah.
Ow.
Maggie, who the hell are these people?
Apparently, they're members of a cult.
They've all been removed?
Yep, and we've got extra security

try to get back in.
Thanks, Kev.
What did you find out about them?
Well, they call themselves HTS, Heal Thyself.

The Greek goddess of healing.
She carried with her a potion

I minored in classical mythology.
Mm-hmm.

Well, Shayna called someone from the scene

Shayna's labs just posted.
She's coming down from CT now, and then I'll send Dakota up.

Excuse me. - Yeah.
Well, I guess I'll be hitting the road,
unless you wanna put me to work.
Coming off a night shift. I'm free.
I appreciate how much you've helped us,

Why don't you go home and get some sleep?
You know, I may have an ulterior motive why I've been
hanging around the ED so much.
Oh, yeah? What's that?
Oh.
So sorry.
Trisha, are you okay?
No, I'm good.
See you around, Mags.
Yeah.
Are you two...
Oh, no. We're just friends.
In that case, you mind putting in a good word for me?
I think I got a little crush.
Oh, yeah. I'd be happy to.
Thank you, Maggie.
You're the best.
Oh, Daniel, good.
Thank you for meeting me.
What's going on?
Will you give this to Sharon?
I'm afraid I'm not going to be able
to make the party after all.
Oh, bummer. What's... what's up?
Pawel, he needs my help.
Well, what does he... what does he need your help with?
Grocery shopping, a few other errands.
Daniel, please. - I didn't say anything.
I did not say anything.
He can't drive.
I am not going to have him walk to the store.
He's my brother.
Sweetie, do you really believe that he can't drive?
Dr. Ripley, I'm sure, did not mean to harm Pawel.
But mistakes happen.
Dr. Ripley didn't make a mistake, Liliana.
You were in the room. You were right there.
I have to go to him.
I really do not want to continue this.
But if we must, at home.
Okay.
Shayna.
Shayna, hi. I'm Dr. Ripley.
Cea.
Where is Cea?
You and your companion were in an accident.
Where is she? Where did you take her?
Your friend is in critical condition,

She doesn't need your help.
I beg to differ,
but right now, we need to focus on you.
What is this?
What are you putting inside me?
It's just some medication to control your blood pressure.

Shayna, your CT revealed a mass on your adrenal gland.
It's likely a pheochromocytoma.
It's a rare tumor that releases epinephrine

Have you found yourself experiencing
panic attack-like symptoms lately?
Rapid heartbeat, shortness of breath, that kind of thing?
Okay, well, this appears
to have gone untreated for some time.
Where is the adrenal gland?
We have two of them.
They're located on top of your kidneys.
The crash caused you to bleed in and around the mass,
which makes it even more imperative
that we surgically remove the pheo as soon as possible
to prevent life-threatening complications

I appreciate your time and your concern
for my well-being, Doctor...
Ripley.
Dr. Ripley.
But I have come to the realization on my own
and without coercion that I don't want surgery
or any medical intervention.
I don't think you understand.
This could kill you at any moment.
I understand completely the potential risks of my choice.
I take full responsibility for any negative consequences

And I would be happy to put that in writing

Okay?
No, no, I got it.
Crockett? - Yeah?
Ambo just landed.

Dr. Tanaka-Reed is with you.
All right, uh, keep an eye

Try not to let them declare anyone dead

Hey.
Have you spoken to Zola?

You haven't been in touch at all?
No. I'm her attending, Maggie.
I'm not her buddy.
Mr. Acosta, I'm Dr. Tanaka-Reed.
We're gonna take good care of you, okay?
Everyone watch the wires.
On my count. One, two, three.
I need to go home. Emily is waiting.

Let's give two of Versed. - Got it.
Oh, no, wait a second.
BP's soft.
Yeah, but he's clearly agitated.
How do you know the change of mental status

Resuscitate before you sedate.
Let's give two units of blood, two of plasma, and TXA, please.
Lungs are equal bilaterally.
Put your hands by your side for me.
There you go.
Pelvis is loose.
Let's get X-ray in here.

All right. I'll be back.

Hey.
Hi, you.

You seem thrilled.

Yeah.

All right.
Did he lose consciousness?

Their founder, a woman named Dakota Andrews,
claims that all illness is a manifestation of stored trauma.

Kind of what I was hoping to talk to you about today.
Do you mind if we sit?

One of her followers?
Yeah, very entrenched in your sister's philosophy,

Oh, God.
When I first heard the story that Dakota

I was afraid that if I confronted her...

That's a really difficult position to be in.
She had a lot of demons.
But I loved...
I loved her very much.

I'm so sorry that it's too late to help your sister.

You can't be serious.

Get Mason. We're leaving now.

Let's go.

Sam.
Come on. Don't do this.

Shayna?

I'm afraid.

No.

Yeah, of course. Come here.
Hannah...
I lied.
Okay.

Hey, that was an accident.
Hey, what's going on?
Hey, honey. What...

Talk to me.
It's my fault.

You were breathing down his neck.

Whoa.
